name: terminal-view
description: Integrated terminal view for Obsidian using ghostty-web and node-pty

scripts.rebuild:electron: node scripts/fix-electron-headers.mjs && node scripts/fix-winpty-cc.mjs && npx @electron/rebuild -m node_modules/node-pty && node scripts/copy-node-pty-binaries.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
